content.rendered:
> The MB560-VL is a multi-biometric device featuring ZKTeco’s innovative visible light facial recognition technology.
Using the latest algorithms and technologies related to face recognition, the device can perform target recognition in a distance profile from 0.3 m to 2m and will automatically turn on when it detects a face in the detection distance so as to deliver it a better discrimination quality in terms of speed and accuracy compared to the previous near infrared face recognition station.

With the applied deep learning algorithm, the mode angle tolerance and anti-plagiarism are greatly improved dynamic environment and various plagiarism attacks. Apart from all that, combined with the world’s advanced three-dimensional fingerprint algorithm and comprehensive support in mainstream card modules and additional support in WiFi ,the MB560-VL should be the most suitable for different work environments that meet different customer needs

deteils

Display 2.8-inch TFT Screen
Face Capacity 3,000
Fingerprint Capacity 3,000
Card Capacity 10,000 (Optional)
Transactions 100,000
Communication TCP/IP, WiFi (Optional), USB Host
Standard Functions ADMS, Work Code, DST, Self-service Query, Automatic Status Switch, T9 Input,
Camera, 9-digit User ID, Multiple Verify Modes, Schedule Bell
Hardware 900MHz Dual Core CPU ;
Memory 512MB RAM / 8G ROM;
2MP WDR Low Light Camera;
Adjustable LED Supplement Lighting
Operation System Linux
Access Control Interface 3rd Party Electric Lock, Door Sensor, Exit Button
Optional Functions 125KHz ID Card (EM) / 13.56MHz IC Card (MF)
Biometrics Algorithms ZKFace V5.8 & ZKFinger V10.0
Facial Recognition Speed ≤1s
Power Supply 12V 1.5A
Working Humidity 20% – 80%
Working Temperature 0 °C – 45 °C
Dimensions (W*H*D) 170 * 138 * 38.55 (mm)
Supported Software BioTime8.0

Data Sheet

excerpt.rendered:
* Face recognition with visible light
• Anti-plagiarism algorithm against printing attack (laser, color, black and white images), video clips attack and three-dimensional mask attack
* Multiple verification methods: face / fingerprint / card / password
* Optional card modules: ID card 125khz (EM) / IC card 13.56 MHz (MF)
* Complement the lighting with adjustable brightness
